If you love Valve and you love Half-Life 2, then you need to play the game that started it all. We all know that Half-Life 3 is coming very soon, so at the very least get your feet wet with the very first Half-Life! The price is very modest and matches the amount of content you get out of this staple in modern gaming. For a game that came out almost 20 years ago, it is still amazing in all sorts of ways!

Non credo sia avanzato molto ancora da dire su Half-Life. Ma voglio sicuramente consigliarlo a chiunque sia anche solo tentato di provarlo. Io l'ho giocato per la prima volta di recente, conoscendolo solo per fama, e devo dire che è una notorietà più che meritata.

Il gioco è fantastico sotto tutti i punti di vista, e trovo che non sia invecchiato di un giorno, anche grazie alla cura di Valve nel mantenere i propri giochi compatibili con i sistemi moderni.
La storia, l'approccio alla narrazione, il level design, il ritmo con cui il gioco procede, l'alternarsi di fasi più action ad altre più platform o puzzle, il gameplay da FPS, le atmosfere a tratti horror, il piede di porco, tutto in questo gioco è fuori parametro, e ci sono giochi moderni che non superano il confronto con questo grande classico.

Giocatelo: costa poco (in saldo ancora meno), è un'esperienza che non può mancare nella vostra collezione, è un'avventura in prima persona che non dimenticherete.
Çocukluğumuzda internet kafede oynadığımız gibi değil herkes çok iyi oynuyor ona göre alın :D

记得小学的时候，在外婆家的电脑上玩这款游戏，它是我接触到的第一批fps之一。而这个作品令我惊叹，不单单是在射击方面，更是在它塑造的世界方面。死尸和骨头，外星人的黄色血液和人类的红色血液，那蠕虫一般爬动的外星生物，说着奇怪语言的伏地岗人，企图毁灭证据的人类军队。还有外星军团和人类军团的较量。 涌现在黑山研究所里的奇异现象，在那时让人感到恐慌。 在游戏中，玩家会经理许多场景，实验基地，军事要塞，沙漠，Grand Canyon，当然还有异星。其中最为令人着迷的，就是异星场景了，微妙的重力，在无尽宇宙的背静下，看着不熟悉的植被上，长着异星叫人害怕又好奇的植物，会发光的草，有攻击性的树。总之，半条命绝对是属于历史上堪称伟大的fps之一。

Fazla söze gerek yok. Bir değil bir çok efsanenin kökü bu oyuna bağlı. Counter-Strike olsun, Team Fortress olsun, Half Life 2 olsun, Garry's Mod olsun, Left 4 Dead olsun... Hatta bir çok FPS oyunu bu oyundan ilham almış bile olabilir. Eğer bu oyun olmasaydı bunlarda olmazdı. Efsane oyundur.

I have flipped my feelings on this game.

Not cause of fanboys.

This game's puzzles, corridor shooting, vent crawling action has found a place near to my heart. It's still not the best shooter. The weapons are barely satisfying. Movement is still slippery. 

But what a fucking adventure.




My initial review:

"100%, Grade-A, unfiltered, nostalgia-fueled fanboy hype.

Slow.
Counter-intuitive.
Shooting has no feel to it.

And is Gordon Freeman wearing fucking ice skates? Jesus, what's the deal with the slippery movement controls? Especially if you're going to make 90% of the game pits with no guardrails.

If this game was released today, it would be tea bagged by reviewers."

Terminei o jogo pela segunda vez no Steam agora (teve umas duas ou três na época das Lans) e mais uma vez me impressionei com esse jogo. É um dos jogos que você se impressiona e se diverte se jogasse em seu lançamento em 1998, ou se joga hoje.
Half-Life é um jogo que gosto de comparar com DOOM (1 e 2) por também ser um FPS frenético contra monstros em uma suit carregando um arsenal variado. O que me faz apreciar mais Half-Life é que ele troca os demônios e inferno por uma história mais apronfundada e armas mais variadas (dignas de ficcção científica que é o jogo). Mas não dá pra comparar tudo devido às limitações técnicas né.
Os bosses de Half-Life são uns dos melhores de todos os FPS. São bem poucos, mas cada um tem uma maneira bem específica de derrotar, e requer um bom tempo para descobrir.
E também tem o multiplayer que é aquele deathmatch frenético gostoso.
Pomimo że gram w tą grę bardzo mało czasu, Half-Life znam już od 2009 r. i oglądałem bardzo dużo odcinków z tej gry przez co ogromnie i gorąco ją polecam. Po prostu mega. :D

I first tried Half life 11 years ago, played the game religiously but never got to finish it because I was always stuck on the "We've got hostiles" chapter, (noob). During those 11 years I always considered Half life to be one of my most favourite games from my childhood but never got around to replaying it. Until a few months ago when i finally bought the game on steam ($10.99 still worth it) and finally beat it. I gotta say even though some of Half life's graphics are outdated it still makes for some of the best FPS gameplay I have ever played out of any other game. I beat the game in one sitting and still to this day still consider it as one of the best first person shooters I have ever played. I dont care if Valve'll ever make a Half life 3, because they created one of the best masterpieces in the gaming industry that revolutionalized the first person shooter genre alongside the original Doom. That's the end of my rant, now go buy this game because you won't regret it at all.

Half-Life is a timeless game. Not only strafe-jumping and bunnyhopping in this game is perfect, but also the huge map creation, the shortcuts, trickjumps and glitches like the different boosting methods are amazing. Simply the perfect game for speedrunning. I play this game over many years now, still play it until today and it never gets boring.

Ну что ж,  пришло время написать мне отзыв по этой игре (P.S. Не надо смотерть на мой "пробег по часам в игре", ибо я раньше уже наиграл свыше 100 часов). Первое что стоит отметить, так это же сюжет игры, тут он просто на высоте. Есть всё, закрученый сюжет, интересные места, и самое главное, так это ПРОДОЛЖИТЕЛЬНОСТЬ самого сюжета, поверьте, уж он очень долгий, когда играешь на самом высоком уровне сложности (об этом позже). Второе, гопники, тут их прсто из магнума бывает фиг убьёшь (то ли пули летят куда попало, то ли гопники, это все поголовно двоюродные братья Чака Норриса, ибо бессмертные, котороых пуля не берёт), хотя они не отличаются умом и сообразительностью, это не мешает им разделывать нас по кусочкам каждый раз, когда они нас встречают из-за угла. Третье, оружие. Тут его навалом, что не скажешь о патронах (это если на сложном). Оружие есть мошьное (в плане "лазерной пушки), и не очень (аля пиндолет и автомОт), но все эти оружия (вплоть до базуки) не сравнятся с великой и не повторимой МОНТИРОВКОЙ ФРИМЕНА (да да, той самой, которкю вы все хотите получить в жизни, и пойти на гопников с района, зная, что с МОНТИРОВКОЙ ФРИМЕНА ни один межгалактический гопник не страшен вам). Пожалуй, отдельно можно сказать про баланс ресов (патроны, аптечки, баттарейки). Когда вам особно не нужно, будет лежать на каждом столе, но вот когда на вас напали гопники, у вас резко не хватает ресов, и не будет ещё столько, пока все гопники не познают силушки богатырской от МОНТИРОВКИ ФРИМЕНА. Я промолчу про гопников босов, на короых ни одних ресов не хватит (Но не стоит забывать про МОНТИРОВКУ ФРИМЕНА)... В общем можно подвести итог: Встретил гопника, бей МОНТИРОВКОЙ, нашёл аптечку, бери МОНТИРОВКУ, упал с обрыва, используй МОНТИРОВКУ, закончились патроны, МОНТИРОВКОЙ по бабшке (не себе)... В общем игра получает 10 МОНТИРОВОК из 10...
Exelent.

I recommend this game if:
-You want to know about the granddaddy of modern FPSs 
-You don't mind a slow start (it only becomes REALLY good after a couple of hours in)
-You don't mind bouncy and slightly slippery physics
-You don't mind if your FPS isn't just about shooting, but also about exploration and solving situational puzzles 
-You don't mind its dated graphics

The game is insanely well-balanced. It feels really, really polished. 

I thought I wouldn't enjoy it at first. Especially since I'm more of an RPG kind of guy. But the action really got to me.

A great game for fans of a classic FPS. Half-Life is a fantastic game with great gameplay, an engaging story to help drive it, a wide range of enemies and weapons, and a variety of interesting and well designed levels. The pacing of the game is just about perfect, and I enjoyed just about every second of the experience. Based on what I heard, I'll enjoy Half-Life 2 even more, but that doesn't make the original any less great of a game. I highly recommend this game to fans of the classics.

Overall Rating: 7.5/10 
Great game, great experience

Honestly, this game is SO MUCH BETTER than Half Life 2.

For the record, I have zero nostalgia for anything Valve; I hardly played any PC games until around 2014. As someone who had no experience with keyboard+mouse, first person shooters, or games made before 2000, Half Life 1 is possibly the best introduction to all three of those things. Controls are a little wonky (probably cause of its age), but is accessable enough for newbies like myself to master it by the end of the game. There are more than a few spots where you'll get lost, don't know what to do, be forced to do some stupid platforming/firefight, etc. but the parts that are well polished are what make it worthwhile.

Immer noch ein super Spiel.

Ich hatte es damals schon gespielt und jetzt die Steam-Version.

Die Grafik ist auch heute noch ganz nett, die Rätsel sind allesamt logisch und das Leveldesign großartig.
Das Waffenarsenal ist beachtlich: Von der bekannten Brechstange bis hin zum Hornissen-spuckenden Alienhandschuh ist alles dabei.
Auf dem höchsten Schwierigkeitsgrad ist es teilweise richtig übel. Man könnte fast sagen, es sei stellenweise unfair, aber wenn man verschiedene Vorgehensweisen ausprobiert und es dann letztendlich geschafft hat, ist man umso erleichterter und auch ein Bisschen stolz.
Die vielen Skriptereignisse sind sehr spannend und sorgen immer wieder für Adrenalinausstoß.

Ich kann - nein ich muss das Spiel nur jedem empfehlen.
Zumindest jeder, der auf Actionspiele steht, muss es mal (durch)gespielt haben.
You know, I don't usually like older games, but this is an exception.  Fantastic game 10/10
